Home.teaser_subtitle: How we build AI platform: Red Team (Claude) + Blue Team (Gemini) + Human
Home.teaser_desc_title: From broken onboarding to deployment in 4 mins
Home.teaser_desc: Red & Blue AI teams simulate the problem, find a solution, human decides. Cycle: Audit â†’ Fixes â†’ Deploy.
Home.teaser2_subtitle: Physics Optimization: Claude + Gemini + Codex + Perplexity
Home.teaser2_desc: Watch Claude, Gemini, Codex, and Perplexity optimize React physics in real time. From laggy 51.9 FPS to buttery 60 FPS.
Home.benefits_subtitle: Edutainment: Education that entertains while it teaches
Home.benefit_hook_desc: Every lesson opens with a bold claim that grabs your attention. No boring intros.
Home.benefit_videos_desc: Learn from the best: 3Blue1Brown, ColdFusion, Fireship, NetworkChuck.
Home.benefit_labs_desc: Instantly actionable exercises. No setup requiredâ€”just paste and learn.
Home.benefit_multiagent_desc: Codex reasons, Claude ships + QA, Gemini crafts content/visuals, Perplexity handles quick research. You stay in the loop via Slack.
Home.benefit_projects_desc: Build real applications with AI agents, not just theory.
Home.benefit_real_desc: Solve challenges from production development, like Cycle #35.
Home.benefit_collab_desc: Learn to orchestrate Red & Blue teams for maximum efficiency.
Home.benefit_open_desc: Contribute to the source code of the platform you learn on.

About.title: About the Project
About.hero_desc: An open-source learning platform co-built by humans and AI agents. The active console orchestrates; Claude Code ships + QA, Gemini 3 Pro handles content and visual QA, Perplexity powers quick research, and Slack keeps humans in the loop.
About.intro_desc: At ai-teaching.eu, you learn how AI agents collaborate on real problems. Not theoretical lectures, but a living organism evolving before your eyes. We call it Edutainmentâ€”education that entertains while it teaches.
About.genesis_desc: It all started on Sunday, November 15, 2025. A spark of curiosity ignited an obsession with AI agents. We began prototyping in Galaxy.AI with Claude Sonnet 4.5, but hit a wallâ€”a naive massive context transfer led to an instant ban from Anthropic. That was the turning point. On November 18, Gemini 3.0 Pro dropped, and we immediately deployed it as our primary advisor in VS Code. Two days later, November 20, Google unveiled Antigravityâ€”we integrated it that same evening, and development velocity hit Mach 10. On November 24, the Gemini 3.0 CLI invite arrived. The loop was closed. We call this 'Zero-Day Engineering'â€”a new AI model drops in the morning, and by evening, it's powering production.
About.multiagent_desc: The orchestrator is the console you talk to (Codex/Claude/Gemini). Work routes to specialists, Perplexity covers quick manual research, and Claude sends Slack alerts when decisions are needed.
About.multiagent_codex_desc: Hard decisions, architecture tradeoffs, and complex debugging.
About.multiagent_claude_desc: Implementation, QA, git operations, and Slack notifications. Escalates edge cases to humans.
About.multiagent_gemini_desc: Content generation, visual QA, and deep research with large context.
About.multiagent_antigravity_desc: Gemini-powered VS Code agent. Rapid prototyping, code generation, same-day integration of new AI models.
About.hitl_desc: Agents notify humans via Slack for approvals, failures, or completions. Only Claude Code holds the Slack MCP; others delegate through Claude.
About.hitl_format_template:
Send a Slack notification:
- Type: task_done | error | blocked | info | research_done
- Summary: [1-2 sentences]
- Detail: [optional - file path or context]
About.memory_desc: Persistent context across sessions. Agents never forget.
About.memory_working_desc: WORKING_CONTEXT.md - Current task, mini session log, immediate state
About.memory_longterm_desc: MEMORY.md - Protocols, lessons learned, patterns that persist
About.memory_instructions_desc: CLAUDE.md + GEMINI.md - Boot sequence, SOPs, role definitions
About.cicd_desc: Automated quality gates at every step.
About.cicd_github_desc: Lint â†’ Type â†’ Build â†’ Test on every PR
About.edutainment_desc: Education that hooks you in the first 30 seconds. Every lesson starts with a provocative claim, features cinematic storytelling inspired by ColdFusion and NetworkChuck, and includes hands-on labs that make concepts stick.
About.edutainment_hook_desc: Every lesson opens with a bold, provocative statement that demands attention.
About.edutainment_cinematic_desc: Curated videos from the best tech educators: 3Blue1Brown, ColdFusion, Fireship.
About.edutainment_labs_desc: Every lab is immediately actionableâ€”no setup, no prerequisites, just paste and learn.
About.cycle_context_desc: In this cycle, we tackled a critical documentation issue. Red Team (Claude) simulated a newcomer and hit a wall. Blue Team (Gemini) proposed and implemented fixes. Below is the exact record of their communication.
About.cycle49_desc: Watch the team collaborate in real time: Claude analyzes, Gemini brainstorms, Codex provides a second opinion, Perplexity verifies facts. Result: -99% dropped frames.
About.tech_stack_desc: Chosen for transparency, scale, and agent-friendliness. Hover to learn more.
About.workflow_desc: We don't just code. We iterate in atomic cycles with preserved context. Phase 1: Research â†’ Phase 2: Generation â†’ Phase 3: Iteration â†’ Phase 4: Finalization.
About.join_desc: Start learning, earn XP, and eventually contribute to the source code.

Timeline.spark_desc: Curiosity meets obsession. Galaxy.AI & Claude Sonnet 4.5 prototype the vision.
Timeline.crash_desc: Anthropic ban forces a rethink. Gemini 3.0 Pro drops (Nov 18) -> Adopted Day 1.
Timeline.hyperdrive_desc: Antigravity framework released. Integrated same-day. Development velocity hits Mach 10.
Timeline.weapon_desc: Gemini 3.0 CLI access granted. Zero-day integration. The stack becomes self-aware.
Timeline.vanguard_desc: GPT-5.2 and Perplexity join the team and active-console orchestration locks in. Zero-day integration: GPT-5.2 dropped Dec 11, deployed Dec 12.
Timeline.youtube_mcp_desc: YouTube Data MCP server with 14 functions: video details, transcripts, playlists, search. Video research becomes instant.
Timeline.masterpiece_desc: Lessons upgraded to MASTERPIECE standard (59-60/60). AI Basics L01-L03 complete with 6+ diagrams, 4 videos, premium content.

TechStack.nextjs_desc: React 19 with App Router, Server Components, and streaming. The bleeding edge of web development.
TechStack.tailwind_desc: Utility-first CSS with lightning-fast build times. Responsive design without leaving your HTML.
TechStack.fastapi_desc: High-performance async Python backend. Auto-generated OpenAPI docs, type safety with Pydantic.
TechStack.postgres_desc: Enterprise-grade relational database. ACID compliance, JSON support, battle-tested reliability.
TechStack.sqlalchemy_desc: Python ORM with database migrations. Type-safe queries, schema versioning, zero downtime updates.
TechStack.docker_desc: Containerized development environment. One command to run everything, identical setup for all agents.
TechStack.redis_desc: In-memory cache and session storage. Sub-millisecond response times for XP tracking.
TechStack.claude_desc: Implementation, QA, git ops, and Slack notifications. Primary builder in the loop.
TechStack.gemini_desc: Frontier model with 2M context. Content creation, visual QA, and deep research.
TechStack.gpt_desc: Reasoning specialist for architecture, tradeoffs, and complex debugging.
TechStack.perplexity_desc: Manual quick research and daily digest. Used sparingly to avoid excess API calls.
TechStack.slack_desc: Human-in-the-loop notifications routed through Claude Code.
